column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Simon - I'm sorry to hear you had an upset stomach. Can you tell me which ramen you ordered? Of the few similar claims we have faced since opening
column2: we have learned that some customers' digestive systems may not be fully accustomed to the thick and heavy nature of some of the traditional Japanese ramen broths that we serve
column3: especially the pork broths. That said
column4: I do appreciate that you enjoyed our food
column5: and depending on what type of ramen you had on your first visit
column6: I would like to invite you back and have you try something that might be better suited for you.
